name: TRIBECCA_HOME_Dillion_Urban_Rolled_Arm_Upholstered_Sofa
reviews: The sofa was super easy to put together. It seemed almost too easy initially, but it's holding up fine so far. I still really like the look of the sofa, but the seat cushions are very stiff. It's a little shallow with regards to sitting with your legs up at all, but it's nice that you can remove the back cushions for added room. Probably won't be the couch I would go to for a comfy night watching movies, but it has grown on me.
description: Add luxury to your seating selection with this charming sofa. with extra cushioning on the seat and back, this piece is just as comfortable as it is trendy. Covered with classic grey linen in an espresso finish, this is the perfect addition to any contemporary living area. This piece's urban design makes it a great sofa for a young person's first apartment.Rolled armsBun feetSet includes: One (1) SofaMaterials: Solid wood frame, foam, polyester and fabricWood finish: EspressoUpholstery color: GreyUpholstery fill: FoamFoam density: 25DFire Retardant: YesCushions are not reversible, and does not have zipperSeat cushion thickness: 7 inchesArm height from the floor: 24 inchesBack cushion height: 18.9 inchesSeat Dimensions: 21.5 inches high x 19.5 inches deep x 61 inches wideOverall sofa dimensions: 37 inches high x 35 inches deep x 76.75 inches widePattern: SolidType: SofaStyle: Casual, UrbanMaterial: Wood, FabricAssembly: Assembly RequiredColor: GreyStyleCountry, Southwestern, Traditional, TransitionalMaterialFabric, WoodTypeSofaAssemblyAssembly RequiredColorGreyFurniture PatternSolid
